<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Judgment of the Monolith](/Feats.aspx?ID=893) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Living Monolith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=16)

**Prerequisites**
[Ka Stone Ritual](/Feats.aspx?ID=889)

</column>

---

You can use the oaths bound in your _ka stone_ to compel the truth from the living and the dead. You can activate your _ka stone_ to target a single living creature, causing that creature to experience the effects of being in a [_zone of truth_](/Spells.aspx?ID=379). You can also activate it with a 10-minute activation (envision) to cast [_talking corpse_](/Spells.aspx?ID=329).
name: Judgment of the Monolith
